body:
What if you had the money to go on your dream vacation.  What would it be?

For me New Zealand
body_tagged:
What if you had the money to go on your dream vacation.  What would it be?

For me New Zealand
title: Dream Vacation

replies.body: Egypt. I love all the rich history there <3
replies.body_tagged: Egypt. I love all the rich history there <3

replies.body: To go and see some of my Avicus Friends
replies.body_tagged: To go and see some of my Avicus Friends

replies.body: I don't really have a "dream vacation", though, as I live in Europe I would love to visit Australia one day.
replies.body_tagged: I don't really have a "dream vacation", though, as I live in Europe I would love to visit Australia one day.

replies.body: I just came from vacation but this is something I always wanted to do, go to a science lab with all different types of medicine and stuff and make cures for diseases.
replies.body_tagged: I just came from vacation but this is something I always wanted to do, go to a science lab with all different types of medicine and stuff and make cures for diseases.

replies.body: But as far as like dream like, go to a naked beach and just live there, I hate clothes, they feel like sand paper for me, but that's because I have aspergers. :)
replies.body_tagged: But as far as like dream like, go to a naked beach and just live there, I hate clothes, they feel like sand paper for me, but that's because I have aspergers. :)

replies.body: I want to visit Australia some time. One of my friends went there for a year and he said it was awesome. I would like to go to Italy as well.
replies.body_tagged: I want to visit Australia some time. One of my friends went there for a year and he said it was awesome. I would like to go to Italy as well.
